entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.9°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 100.2 kPa

Dewpoint: -41.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
